property.name: nsa.datawave.ingest.poller.manager.HornetQEventProcessor.datatypes.whitelist
property.description: Comma seperated list of allowed datatype output name prefixes, case-sensitive. If a processed event's datatype output name does not start with any of the prefixes configured here, then it will be ignored. If no prefixes are configured here, then the specified processor will ignore all events
